body.p:
To His Excellency Thos E Bramlett
Governor of the State of Kentucky

Whearas A certain Arnold Snider a young ^man^ about Eighteen or nineteen years of age Was senteced to and ser confined in the Penatentiary of this state in 1862 for the crime of drowning a man by the of Jas. Brigs and the sd Arnold Snider was as we believe wrongly con=convicted of said crime We your petitioners therefore pray your Excellency that you discharge the said Snider from confiement and let him go at liberty (the said Snider was convicted at Greenup County Ky) and your petitioner will ever pray this January 1864
